general_advidory: Ensure to monitor the weather changes closely and adjust your farming activities accordingly.

rice.advisory: Planting should be done in areas with sufficient water availability.

wheat.advisory: Ensure proper fertilization and pest control practices are implemented.

corn.advisory: Harvesting timing should be chosen based on moisture content of the kernels.

soybean.advisory: Rotate soybean crops with legumes to improve soil fertility.

cotton.advisory: Monitor plant growth regularly and apply appropriate irrigation techniques.
